@description.name: @description
@description.body: The Pane provides a window of a larger virtual grid. The actual rendering is performed by one or several layers ({@link ILayer}. The pane computes, which cells of the virtual area is visible and instructs the layers to render these cells.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowCount {Integer?0} The number of rows of the virtual grid.
@param.description: The number of rows of the virtual grid.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: columnCount {Integer?0} The number of columns of the virtual grid.
@param.description: The number of columns of the virtual grid.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: cellHeight {Integer?10} The default cell height.
@param.description: The default cell height.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: cellWidth {Integer?10} The default cell width.
@param.description: The default cell width.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if a cell is tapped.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if a cell is right-clicked.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if a cell is double-tapped.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired on resize of either the container or the (virtual) content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if the pane is scrolled horizontally.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if the pane is scrolled vertically.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the axis object, which defines the row numbers and the row sizes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the axis object, which defines the column numbers and the column sizes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array containing the layer container.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a layer to the layer container.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layer {qx.ui.virtual.core.ILayer} The layer to add.
@param.description: The layer to add.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a list of all layers.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a list of all visible layers.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.virtual.core.ILayer[]} List of the pane's visible layers.
@return.description: List of the pane's visible layers.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum horizontal scroll position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum vertical scroll position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the content to the given left coordinate.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The vertical position to scroll to.
@param.description: The vertical position to scroll to.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the vertical scroll offset.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the content to the given top coordinate.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Integer} The horizontal position to scroll to.
@param.description: The horizontal position to scroll to.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the horizontal scroll offset.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The (virtual) size of the content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls a row into the visible area of the pane.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: row {Integer} The row's index.
@param.description: The row's index.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls a column into the visible area of the pane.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: column {Integer} The column's index.
@param.description: The column's index.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls a grid cell into the visible area of the pane.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: row {Integer} The cell's row index.
@param.description: The cell's row index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: column {Integer} The cell's column index.
@param.description: The cell's column index.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the grid cell at the given absolute document coordinates. This method can be used to convert the pointer position returned by {@link qx.event.type.Pointer#getDocumentLeft} and {@link qx.event.type.Pointer#getDocumentLeft} into cell coordinates.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
documentX {Integer} The x coordinate relative to the viewport
    origin.
@param.description:
The x coordinate relative to the viewport
    origin.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
documentY {Integer} The y coordinate relative to the viewport
    origin.
@param.description:
The y coordinate relative to the viewport
    origin.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map|null} A map containing the row and column of the found cell. If the coordinate is outside of the pane's bounds or there is no cell at the coordinate null is returned.
@return.description: A map containing the row and column of the found cell. If the coordinate is outside of the pane's bounds or there is no cell at the coordinate null is returned.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Increase the layers width beyond the needed width to improve horizontal scrolling. The layers are only resized if invisible parts left/right of the pane window are smaller than minLeft/minRight.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
minLeft {Integer} Only prefetch if the invisible part left of the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.
@param.description:
Only prefetch if the invisible part left of the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
maxLeft {Integer} The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    left of the pane window.
@param.description:
The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    left of the pane window.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
minRight {Integer} Only prefetch if the invisible part right of the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.
@param.description:
Only prefetch if the invisible part right of the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
maxRight {Integer} The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    right of the pane window.
@param.description:
The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    right of the pane window.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Increase the layers height beyond the needed height to improve vertical scrolling. The layers are only resized if invisible parts above/below the pane window are smaller than minAbove/minBelow.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
minAbove {Integer} Only prefetch if the invisible part above the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.
@param.description:
Only prefetch if the invisible part above the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
maxAbove {Integer} The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    above the pane window.
@param.description:
The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    above the pane window.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
minBelow {Integer} Only prefetch if the invisible part below the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.
@param.description:
Only prefetch if the invisible part below the
    pane window if smaller than this (pixel) value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
maxBelow {Integer} The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    below the pane window.
@param.description:
The amount of pixel the layers should reach
    below the pane window.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resize event handler. Updates the visible window.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resize event handler. Do a full update on first appear.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for pointer down. Remembers cell position to prevent pointer event when cell position change.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Pointer} The incoming pointer event.
@param.description: The incoming pointer event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for pointer taps. Fires an cellTap event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Pointer} The incoming pointer event.
@param.description: The incoming pointer event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for context menu taps. Fires an cellContextmenu event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Pointer} The incoming pointer event.
@param.description: The incoming pointer event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for double taps. Fires an cellDbltap event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Pointer} The incoming pointer event.
@param.description: The incoming pointer event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fixed scrollbar position whenever it is out of range it can happen when removing an item from the list reducing the max value for scrollY #8976

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Converts a pointer event into a cell event and fires the cell event if the pointer is over a cell.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Pointer} The pointer event.
@param.description: The pointer event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: cellEventType {String} The name of the cell event to fire.
@param.description: The name of the cell event to fire.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the size of the layers to contain the cells at the pixel position "left/right" up to "left+minHeight/right+minHeight". The offset of the layer container is adjusted to respect the pane's scroll top and scroll left values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layers {qx.ui.virtual.core.ILayer[]} List of layers to update.
@param.description: List of layers to update.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: left {Integer} Maximum left pixel coordinate of the layers.
@param.description: Maximum left pixel coordinate of the layers.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: top {Integer} Maximum top pixel coordinate of the layers.
@param.description: Maximum top pixel coordinate of the layers.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: minWidth {Integer} The minimum end coordinate of the layers will be larger than left+minWidth.
@param.description: The minimum end coordinate of the layers will be larger than left+minWidth.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: minHeight {Integer} The minimum end coordinate of the layers will be larger than top+minHeight.
@param.description: The minimum end coordinate of the layers will be larger than top+minHeight.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
doFullUpdate {Boolean?false} Whether a full update on the layer
    should be performed of if only the layer window should be updated.
@param.description:
Whether a full update on the layer
    should be performed of if only the layer window should be updated.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Check whether the pane was resized and fire an {@link #update} event if it was.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Schedule a full update on all visible layers.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether a full update is scheduled.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether a full update is scheduled.
@return.description: Whether a full update is scheduled.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Perform a full update on all visible layers. All cached data will be discarded.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Schedule an update the visible window of the grid according to the top and left scroll positions.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update the visible window of the grid according to the top and left scroll positions.

@description.name: @description

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
